ingredients: ["1/2 bunch Swiss chard, chopped","1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram","1/2 teaspoon salt","1/3 cup chopped onion","1/4 cup plain dried bread crumbs","1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper","1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg","2 cups 2% milk","2 tablespoons butter, divided","3 eggs","8 ounces salmon fillets, skin removed"]
title: Salmon and Swiss Chard Quiche Recipe - Allrecipes.com
